description:
• What we'll do
Hey everyone!

This will be our first Workshop and "special event" in a while :)
David Dias will be showing us how to best make use of the [Front-end Checklist](https://github.com/thedaviddias/Front-End-Checklist) to make sure our web applications are up to good standards.

• What to bring
Bring a laptop, a project of yours, and a pinch of curiosity :)

• Important to know
name: Porto Codes Workshops: Front-end Checklist
